Recommendations: it is suggest that stakeholder particularly student and clientele may be involve in the planning replanning organization and implementation of extension activity
it is encourage that clientele other than teacher may be reach out by the extension program of the college
it is encourage that all faculty may be involve in extension activity which be in line with their specialization
it is encourage that periodic monitoring and evaluation of extension project may be conduct to assess the progress of the activity conduct

it is suggest that technology generate from extension service may be package properly and disseminate to the clientele through various mean such as brochure leaflet cdsdvds and other form of communication medium
it is highly suggest that technology generate from extension may be utilized for instruction and research activity

it is encourage that extension activity to the adopt school be sustain and consider other aspect of development other than the request service to create more impact and significance on the part of the clientele
if possible faculty may be give equivalent teach load in extension for the conduct extension activity relevant to their specialization
